thread.title: Cloud|AG Will Present Lighting Up Office 365 SharePoint Online with ServicePoint365 At Cloud Saturday Conference
thread.title_full: Cloud|AG Will Present Lighting Up Office 365 SharePoint Online with ServicePoint365 At Cloud Saturday Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Cloud|AG Will Present Lighting Up Office 365 SharePoint Online with ServicePoint365 At Cloud Saturday Conference
text:
Cloud|AG announces they will be presenting how ServicePoint365 can enable Office 365 SharePoint Online during the upcoming Cloud Saturday Atlanta.
Peachtree Corners, GA (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
Cloud|AG, a leading provider of Microsoft cloud solutions, today announced they will be presenting how ServicePoint365 can enable Office 365 SharePoint Online during the upcoming Cloud Saturday Atlanta. The solution provides Office 365 customers a way to unlock the value of SharePoint Online without the need for deep SharePoint skills.
Cloud Saturday Atlanta is a community-focused event dedicated to educating and engaging members of the business and technology communities, by drawing on expertise from local, regional and national IT professionals, developers, architects and business decision makers who come together to share real world experiences, lessons learned, best practices and industry insights. Topics include Amazon Web Services, Azure, Office 365, Salesforce, IBM, DevOps, and more. Conference is Saturday September 26th and attendees can register at http://atlanta.cloudsaturday.com/ .
ServicePoint365 is an Office 365 SharePoint App designed with an intuitive user interface and information architecture that organizes content into a structure that makes sense and takes the guesswork out of where information is created and stored. The solution consists of a number of “Centers” that are pre-configured for Company Intranet, Client/Prospect Management (CRM), Project Management, Proposal Management, Resource Management, Process Management, Knowledge Management and Vendor Management. Customers simply apply ServicePoint365 to their Office 365’s SharePoint Online environment and immediately start managing and collaborating on critical information in a secure, stable and easy-to-use environment.
“We are excited to be sharing our experience with the Atlanta community alongside other leading cloud industry professionals. Office 365 SharePoint Online can provide companies with some incredible benefits if implemented correctly. ServicePoint365 is one way to unlock this value particularly in organizations that may not have deep SharePoint skills,” said David Huseonica, President at Cloud|AG.
About Cloud|AG
Cloud|AG provides products and services designed to assist companies of all sizes maximize the power and flexibility of Microsoft’s Office 365 and Azure cloud platform. For additional information on ServicePoint365 or to become a partner, contact Cloud|AG at info(at)cloudag.com, (855) 256-8324, or visit http://www.cloudag.com . All product and company names herein may be trademarks of their registered owners.
